item.title: Deploy Azure Bastion as Code with Terraform
item.author: thqnhat@outlook.com (Nhat Tong)

item.title: First post!
item.author: thqnhat@outlook.com (Nhat Tong)
item.description: Yeah. This is real. My blog is live :) Long time ago, I would like to make a blog to share my experience and my point of view but I did’nt arrange myself to do that. Recently, I viewed some technical blogs that hosted by GitHub and these are inspring me how I can build fastly a blog with GitHub pages. And that I would like to share with you in this article.
